summary: The Phryges, the Mascot Of Olympic Games Paris 2024 - The Phryges, the Mascot Of Olympic Games Paris 2024, is derived from the Phrygian hat that symbolizes freedom. Through the Phryges, we can experience the spirit and culture of the Olympic Games together. This symbolic culture is in line with the concept of memes, free trade, rejection of lies, rejection of FUD. Let all memes be engraved with The Phryges, join the new meme revolution, and make memes great again!
